name: @bx-looop/soil-domain-service
description: A service for managing soil samples
author: Bx

scripts.build: tsc && cp ../.npmignore dist/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.local:install: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && rm -rf /tmp/empty-cache && npm install --cache /tmp/empty-cache
scripts.local:publish: npm run local:install && npm run build && npm run local:publish-config && cd dist && node ../../bin/post-version.js && npm unpublish --force && npm publish
